Plot: A guy and girl try to keep their relationship strictly physical, but it's not long before they learn that they want something more.
Title: No Strings Attached
Writer: Elizabeth Meriwether (screenplay), Michael Samonek (story), Elizabeth Meriwether (story)
Actors: Natalie Portman, Ashton Kutcher, Kevin Kline, Cary Elwes
tomatoConsensus: It benefits from the presence of Natalie Portman and director Ivan Reitman's steady hand, but No Strings Attached doesn't have the courage or conviction to follow through on its ribald premise.
